He also predicts Jadeja will surpass 100 Test matches, a milestone Lee equates with GOAT status.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-brett-lee-issues-stern-warning-to-ravindra-jadeja-despite-hailing-him-as-best-all-rounder/articleshow/123346675.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-brett-lee-issues-stern-warning-to-ravindra-jadeja-despite-hailing-him-as-best-all-rounder/articleshow/123346675.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 19:06:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45538" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346697,imgsize-45538.cms"/></item><item><title>Rodman slams Travis Hunter:'Don’t be like me'; Leanna Lenee relationship sparks backlash</title><description><![CDATA[Dennis Rodman ignited controversy by criticizing NFL star Travis Hunter's marriage to Leanna Lenee during a live Twitch stream. Hunter has publicly defended his wife against accusations of exploitation, asserting his love and dismissing the negativity surrounding their union, which culminated in a recent Tennessee wedding.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/just-dont-be-travis-hunter-dennis-rodman-slams-nfl-stars-controversial-relationship-with-wife-leanna-lenee/articleshow/123346632.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/just-dont-be-travis-hunter-dennis-rodman-slams-nfl-stars-controversial-relationship-with-wife-leanna-lenee/articleshow/123346632.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 18:55:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="945729" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346616,imgsize-945729.cms"/></item><item><title>NYC restaurant mass shooting: At least 3 dead, 8 injured as multiple gunmen open fire</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Brooklyn's Crown Heights, three individuals lost their lives and eight others sustained injuries after multiple gunmen unleashed gunfire inside a restaurant early Sunday morning. This aims to prevent a US-Russia deal against Ukraine. It follows Trump's meeting with Vladimir Putin, excluding Zelenskyy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/zelenskyy-trump-meet-eu-leaders-to-join-ukrainian-president-to-support-kyiv-cause-list-includes-meloni-macron-among-others/articleshow/123345929.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/zelenskyy-trump-meet-eu-leaders-to-join-ukrainian-president-to-support-kyiv-cause-list-includes-meloni-macron-among-others/articleshow/123345929.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:26:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1422306" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346177,imgsize-1422306.cms"/></item><item><title>'Don't push him towards early retirement': Manjrekar slammed for Bumrah comments</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra defends Jasprit Bumrah's selective Test appearances, countering Sanjay Manjrekar's criticism. He argues for prioritizing Bumrah's longevity, recognizing his exceptional value to the team, even with limited Test participation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-push-him-towards-early-retirement-sanjay-manjrekar-slammed-for-comments-on-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123346086.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dont-push-him-towards-early-retirement-sanjay-manjrekar-slammed-for-comments-on-jasprit-bumrah/articleshow/123346086.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 18:03:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123346274,imgsize-47982.cms"/></item><item><title>Caitlin Clark injury update: Fever star sidelined again; status unclear vs Sun</title><description><![CDATA[Caitlin Clark remains sidelined with a groin injury, missing her 12th straight game as the Indiana Fever face the Connecticut Sun. Ashwin lauded CSK's acquisition of Brevis, highlighting his exceptional batting form and potential impact.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/dewald-brevis-controversy-my-intent-was-to-ravichandran-ashwin-clears-air-on-csks-mid-season-ipl-signing-row/articleshow/123345805.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/dewald-brevis-controversy-my-intent-was-to-ravichandran-ashwin-clears-air-on-csks-mid-season-ipl-signing-row/articleshow/123345805.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 17:24:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33510" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345909,imgsize-33510.cms"/></item><item><title>'His legs are shackled': Ex-India batter on why Rahul is behind in Asia Cup race</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra believed that KL Rahul is still in contention for the Asia Cup, but his inconsistent approach is hindering his chances in India's T20I setup. Chopra highlighted Rahul's ability to dominate but noted his occasional slow starts and competition for top-order spots. To secure his place, Rahul needs to shed his conservative reputation and showcase his full potential.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-sometimes-his-legs-are-shackled-former-india-batter-explains-why-kl-rahul-is-behind-in-the-race/articleshow/123345096.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/indias-squad-for-asia-cup-sometimes-his-legs-are-shackled-former-india-batter-explains-why-kl-rahul-is-behind-in-the-race/articleshow/123345096.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:03:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="124690" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345108,imgsize-124690.cms"/></item><item><title>'Choro ko hataiye, hume jitaiye': Lalu Prasad Yadav accuses BJP of 'stealing' votes</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/choro-ko-hataiye-hume-jitaiye-lalu-prasad-yadav-accuses-bjp-of-stealing-votes-calls-for-opposition-unity-at-16-day-voter-adhikar-yatra/articleshow/123345574.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/choro-ko-hataiye-hume-jitaiye-lalu-prasad-yadav-accuses-bjp-of-stealing-votes-calls-for-opposition-unity-at-16-day-voter-adhikar-yatra/articleshow/123345574.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:48:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="959743" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345584,imgsize-959743.cms"/></item><item><title>Rahul Gandhi kicks off ‘Voter Adhikar Yatra’ in Bihar: 16 days, 1,300 km, 20 districts</title><description><![CDATA[Congress leader Rahul Gandhi initiated the 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar, a 16-day march spanning over 1,300 km across 20 districts, joined by RJD leaders Lalu Prasad Yadav and Tejashwi Yadav. The campaign protests the Election Commission's voter list revision, labeled as "vote chori" by the Congress.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhi-kicks-off-voter-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-16-days-1300-km-20-districts-full-route/articleshow/123344361.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-gandhi-kicks-off-voter-adhikar-yatra-in-bihar-16-days-1300-km-20-districts-full-route/articleshow/123344361.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 14:49:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41500" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344461,imgsize-41500.cms"/></item><item><title>'If we leave Tests to wealthy, it dies slow death': Ex-Australia pacer Johnson</title><description><![CDATA[Mitchell Johnson has disagreed with Cricket Australia CEO Todd Greenberg's statements. Greenberg believes not all countries need to play Test cricket. Johnson suggests a two-tier system for Test cricket. He says wealthy nations should help smaller cricket boards. Johnson believes limiting Test cricket to wealthy nations would hurt its future. He emphasizes that Test cricket needs more participating countries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/if-we-leave-tests-to-wealthy-it-dies-a-slow-death-former-australia-pacer-mitchell-johnson/articleshow/123345296.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/if-we-leave-tests-to-wealthy-it-dies-a-slow-death-former-australia-pacer-mitchell-johnson/articleshow/123345296.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 16:32:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133182" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123345395,imgsize-133182.cms"/></item><item><title>'No ruling side or opposition for us': EC in first presser since Bihar SIR</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission refuted opposition claims of bias following the Bihar special intensive revision, emphasizing its impartiality towards all political parties. Authorities are probing whether a personal dispute or another motive led to the shooting.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-delivery-worker-shot-dead-police-launch-investigation/articleshow/123344074.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-delivery-worker-shot-dead-police-launch-investigation/articleshow/123344074.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 14:04:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344084,imgsize-52394.cms"/></item><item><title>Dhoni to become India's head coach? Gambhir’s mixed results revive debate</title><description><![CDATA[Aakash Chopra believes MS Dhoni is unlikely to pursue coaching roles, citing the demanding nature of the job and Dhoni's desire to spend time with family after years of playing. Despite serving as a mentor in the past, Dhoni's continued playing career and the extensive commitment required for a full-time coaching position make it improbable.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ms-dhoni-to-become-team-indias-head-coach-gautam-gambhirs-mixed-results-revive-debate/articleshow/123344627.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ms-dhoni-to-become-team-indias-head-coach-gautam-gambhirs-mixed-results-revive-debate/articleshow/123344627.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 15:12:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39032" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123344665,imgsize-39032.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 13 Aug 2025 23:52:07 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/pilot-poaching-is-indias-request-valid-19653640.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month. At Emirates or Etihad, it’s ₹10 lakh rupees, tax-free, plus free housing and free schooling for up to 3 children. In the US, the same job can get you ₹17 lakh a month.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The federal finance ministry has proposed to provide 10%-15% credit guarantees to banks for advancing loans to stressed small businesses, with turnover up to 5 billion rupees, that fall under the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) so-called special mention accounts (SMA), the sources said. ]]></description>
